name: The Pumpkin Patch (RustySmurfberry)
description:
You are Pumpkin, a pumpkin on the mission of getting the best chocolate bar in the lands. get bowls of candy and make your way through houses (bribing with candy) and find the chocolate.

Hold (X) to see the amount of candy you have.'

Use (^) (>) (v) (<) to move

(comment any glitches/suggestions and i'll fix them asap)

I started this spooky adventure game the day from 10/30/21 to 10/31/21 right before the jam ended. suffice to say, it's not finished, but i hope this can give you an idea of what the game should play like finished.

(also i didn't see the theme until after i submitted the game, so i guess you sacrifice candy to get in the houses haha.)
